page.title: 15THOUGHTS FROM 1985 MEMBERS
page.content: We are not quite sure what people will make of our work in another 1000 years time. We hope it will be interesting and tell you more about the way we live. Probably you will think we live in a strange way from how you live. Will you be having meal times like us or merely take an energy pill ? Will you go to school or sit at home in front of a computer ? We have enjoyed this work and made lots of visits ,our school walls are full of maps and drawings. Even our names may prove interesting: Kerensa & Halcyon Case, Iren & Sonya Novotni,Julian Green ,Elanor Young,Tara Rice,Patricia & Caroline Moore,Hannah Fox, Abigail & Laura Taylor,Caroline Prenton, Robert & Beverley Franklin, Charlotte & Flavia Munn,Hilary Gage,Emma Pendle, James & Oliver Puchoras, Rachel Smith , Lawson Pratt.
